name: EverettMall
0:
”Alexa, ask Everett Mall what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Everett Mall what time do they open”
”Alexa, ask Everett Mall whats the phone number”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: everett mall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Everett Mall’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Everett Mall. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Everett Mall’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Everett Mall.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.shopeverettmall.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
